About Me

Few things about me.........

BIO

Victor is a passionate researcher, Frontend Developer with hands-on experience with identifying web-based user interactions along with designing and implementing highly–responsive user interfaces. Proficient in translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code and writing application interface code using JavaScript and React Js workflows. Skilled in Web Design (Frontend Design) - React js and its libraries, Redux, Node Js, Next Js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Material-UI, MySql, Laravel Restful API, Bootstrap, WORDPRESS, etc. Adept at monitoring and maintaining frontend performance, troubleshooting and debugging.

Teknokleen Group Lagos State

Frontend Developer
  • Designed an online management system using React Js for managing all employees and clients’ details.
  • Creating a database of all ambassadors for easy access to their profile.
  • Convert UI/UX designs into excellent accessible ecommerce website.
  • Effective management of the company website and online platform for HMO of over 2000 ambassadors.
  • Build a RESTFUL API using Laravel.
  • Designed website for clients and ensure all user input is validated before submitting to back-end

Freelancer

Frontend Web Developer
  • Convert Figma designs into excellent accessible ecommerce website
  • Gathering the client’s requirement and translating into a responsive, dynamic web app utilizing html, CSS, Bootstrap, React Js etc
  • Convert UI/UX designs into prototypes, creating excellent interactions from design
  • Troubleshoot and debugged website code to improve functionality and performance
  • Designed website, tested websites and performed user testing and troubleshooting prior to deployment and ensure design is optimized for smartphones
  • Participated in designing a church management system using REACT JS and Material-UI

Adels Corporate Solutions

Assistant Coordinator
  • Assisted in training the industrial training students on extensive use of Microsoft Excel for data analysis (Pivot table, Macros)
  • Taught industrial training students on the basic knowledge of HTML, BOOTSTRAP and CSS for Web Design. Carried out ICT seminars for secondary schools in Ekiti State on how to develop simple web application to perform mathematical calculation using HTML, CSS and JAVASCRIPT.
  • Setting up of effective marketing strategies for targeted customers which increase the sales from 40% to 70%.
